Brand Executive (Pharma) Job at Shalina Diagnostics




        
    

        
        Shalina Diagnostics is a leading provider of diagnostic services committed to delivering quality healthcare solutions. We pride ourselves on providing accurate, timely, and reliable diagnostic services to patients and healthcare professionals. Our team is dedicated to excellence and innovation, ensuring that every patient receives the best care possible.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand Executive (Pharma)

Job ID: JOB-374
Job Location: Lagos

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Brand Strategy Development: Contribute to the formulation of comprehensive brand strategies that align with the company's vision, mission, and target market. This involves conducting market research, competitor analysis, and customer insights to identify growth opportunities and areas for brand improvement.
	Brand Identity Management: Oversee the development and maintenance of the brand's visual identity, including logos, color schemes, typography, and brand guidelines. Ensure brand consistency across all communication channels and marketing materials.
	Marketing Campaigns and Collateral: Collaborate with the marketing team to create engaging marketing campaigns that effectively communicate the brand's key messages and unique selling propositions. Supervise the production of marketing collateral, such as brochures, flyers, digital ads, and social media content.
	Event Management: Plan, coordinate, and execute brand-related events, such as product launches, trade shows, and promotional activities. Ensure that these events align with the brand's positioning and objectives.
	Consumer Insights: Stay informed about consumer trends, preferences, and feedback related to the brand and its products/services. Use this information to make data-driven decisions and adapt brand strategies accordingly.
	Budget Management: Assist in developing and managing the brand marketing budget, ensuring cost-effectiveness and maximizing ROI for brand-related activities.


Requirements


	Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum Experience: (typically2-4 years) in brand management, marketing, or a related role.


Job Specific Skills:


	Brand Strategy and Management: Proficiency in formulating and executing brand strategies to establish a strong brand identity and achieve organizational objectives.
	Ability to monitor and maintain brand consistency across various marketing channels and communication materials.

Warehouse Officer Job at Shalina Healthcare




        
    

        
        Shalina Healthcare is one of the largest pharmaceutical companies in sub-Saharan Africa. For the last 35 years, we have made it our mission to provide quality medicines to those who need it the most. We manufacture and distribute branded prescription and over-the-counter pharmaceutical and consumer products across various therapeutic groups, including anti-malarial, antibiotics, anti-inflammatory, and nutrition. We have a track record few can match and our brands are among the most trusted in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Officer
Job Location: Lagos
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Description
Key Area of Responsibilties include but are not limited to the following activities:


	Keeping inventory of stocks
	Planning and scheduling the delivery of goods
	Liaise and negotiate with transporters on rate of services
	Managing the loading of Vehicles and ensuring proper dispatch/tracking of delivery vans
	He is to ensure in-fully and on-time deliveries.
	He is to provide daily reports on dispatch status for all consumers order across the country
	He will be first point of contact for business queries and sales team.
	He needs to coordinate with the sales teams for customers deliveries.


Qualifications, Experience & Skills


	Minimum Qualifications: BSc Degree in Physical Sciences
	Minimum Experience: 2-4 years of experience
	Job Specific Skills: Good communication and presentation skills, aggressive, good Leadership and interpersonal skills, good man management skills.

  "description": "The&nbsp;Blowfish Group -&nbsp;In the heart of Victoria Island, brings you the world in one place. Hospitality and leisure, backed by a truly international team of industry professionals. Global standards and the warmth of Nigerian hospitality perfected over time. With our unique approach to servicing, we offer high-end hospitality and leisure carefully tailored with love to suit our customers&rsquo; requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer / Motion Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	You will be responsible to assist with the efficient running of the department in line with the Blowfish Group Corporate Strategies and brand standards, whilst meeting employee, guest and owner expectations.
	The Graphic Designer will be responsible to create Artwork for promotional materials - Video Ads, Flyers, Rollups, Banners, Store Branding, creating artwork for social media promotions, updating company profiles and portfolios, creating artwork for magazine Ads.


Responsibilities


	Confident communication with colleagues and clients to understand their ideas and bring them to life
	Working alongside digital teams to help deliver cross-discipline projects
	The ability to work well under pressure
	Previous experience working in medium-large scale mixed discipline projects
	A commitment to high quality work and perfecting details
	A team player with a friendly and collaborative approach to projects
	Passion for photography and design.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 3 - 7 years of relevant work experience.


Skills:


	Expert knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, specifically In Design, Illustrator and Photoshop
	Strong knowledge in Video Editing &amp; Animation
	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
	Strong layout and typography skills
	Proactive and reactive problem-solving.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV and Portfolio&nbsp;to:&nbsp;kingsley.orji@theblowfishhotel.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Graphic Designer / Motion Designer Job at Blowfish Group




        
    

        
        The Blowfish Group - In the heart of Victoria Island, brings you the world in one place. Hospitality and leisure, backed by a truly international team of industry professionals. Global standards and the warmth of Nigerian hospitality perfected over time. With our unique approach to servicing, we offer high-end hospitality and leisure carefully tailored with love to suit our customers’ requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer / Motion Designer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	You will be responsible to assist with the efficient running of the department in line with the Blowfish Group Corporate Strategies and brand standards, whilst meeting employee, guest and owner expectations.
	The Graphic Designer will be responsible to create Artwork for promotional materials - Video Ads, Flyers, Rollups, Banners, Store Branding, creating artwork for social media promotions, updating company profiles and portfolios, creating artwork for magazine Ads.


Responsibilities


	Confident communication with colleagues and clients to understand their ideas and bring them to life
	Working alongside digital teams to help deliver cross-discipline projects
	The ability to work well under pressure
	Previous experience working in medium-large scale mixed discipline projects
	A commitment to high quality work and perfecting details
	A team player with a friendly and collaborative approach to projects
	Passion for photography and design.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree with 3 - 7 years of relevant work experience.


Skills:


	Expert knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, specifically In Design, Illustrator and Photoshop
	Strong knowledge in Video Editing & Animation
	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
	Strong layout and typography skills
	Proactive and reactive problem-solving.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV and Portfolio to: kingsley.orji@theblowfishhotel.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at G-Shoppers
content:
G-Shoppers provide easy food shopping support to homes, career men, and women and business people who are faced with the challenge of being constantly away from home and have less or no time to shop as well as cook. We execute orders to supply food stuff and items such as fresh meat, sea foods, frozen, dry foods, vegetables, fruits, and prepped ready to cook food ingredients. We are based in portharcourt.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Order Packing & Quality Control Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Pick and assemble customer orders from inventory accurately and efficiently.
	Coordinate with the processing team to ensure items that require special preparation are handled correctly.
	Double-check and pack orders to ensure they meet quality standards and customer specifications.
	Maintain a high level of accuracy and ensure orders are ready for dispatch within the allocated time frame.
	Work closely with the inventory and logistics teams to ensure a smooth workflow.
	Take responsibility for the accuracy and quality of orders, helping to minimize delays and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Physically fit to stand and move around for longer time.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
	Ability to work efficiently under time constraints.
	Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
	Previous experience in order fulfillment/packing, inventory management, or a similar role is a plus but not compulsory.
	Willing towork Mondays to Saturdays full day with a one day off in a month.
	Resident in Port Harcourt and not far from Eliozu.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application to: gshoppersrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Customer Service & Sales Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We’re hiring a Customer Service & Sales Officer who will serve as the first point of contact for customers—mainly online. This is a full-time, on-site role.
	You will be responsible for closing sales, following up on leads, updating catalogs, responding to customer inquiries, and ensuring orders are processed smoothly.
	Our sales orders come through WhatsApp (from Instagram ads and returning customers), website and 10% from in-store walk-ins. You must be sales-driven and result-oriented.


Key Responsibilities


	Close sales from WhatsApp leads (especially from Instagram ads).
	Follow up with new leads and returning customers until the sale is closed.
	Meet daily/weekly sales targets and help grow conversion rate.
	Update prices and upload new items on the WhatsApp catalog.
	Monitor daily website orders and print them out for processing.
	Respond to customer complaints and resolve them promptly.
	Maintain accurate records of orders, chats, and complaints.
	Provide helpful product information and recommendations to customers.
	Send daily or weekly reports showing leads, conversations, orders, and conversions.
	Always maintain a respectful, professional tone with customers.
	Work in sink with other sales reps to achiev the company goals


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree qualification with at least 2 years of work experience.
	Comfortable using WhatsApp Business, websites, and basic digital tools.
	Highly organized and proactive.
	Candidate must reside in Portharcourt and not far away fromEliozu the office location.
	Must have completed National Youth Service Corporation (NYSC)
	Available to work full-time and physically present at the office.
	Strong communication and proven sales skills (especially online sales).
	Able to work Mondays to Saturdays
	Should be willing to work with the company long term.


Salary
N120,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief message explaining why they're a good fit for this role to: gshoppersrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Indicate your location in Port Harcourt in the body of the mail.

 

 

3.) Foodstuff Inventory Entry Officer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking to hire a detail-oriented and organized Data Entry Executive to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for accurately entering, updating, and maintaining data in our systems.


Responsibilities


	Enter data accurately and efficiently into the company's databse or inventory software.
	Ensure all data entries are done accurately and closed out daily.
	Review and verify data for accuracy and completeness before submission.
	Update existing records as necessary and ensure that all information is current.
	Generate reports based on entered data and assist in data analysis when required.
	Maintain confidentiality of sensitive information and adhere to data protection regulations.
	Identify and correct errors in data entry processes to improve efficiency.
	Collaborate with other team members to ensure timely completion of data-related tasks.
	Assist in training new employees on data entry processes and best practices.
	Perform other administrative tasks as assigned by the supervisor.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess minimum of a Bachelor's Degree with 1+ years of relevant work experience.
	Must reside in or around Eliozu.
	Strong communication, memorization, and teamwork skills.
	Capacity to perform your duties diligently, particularly during stressful situations.
	Should be willing to work mondays to saturdays with one day off in a month.
	Should be willing to work with the company long term.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: gshoppersrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Candidates should indicate their location in Port Harcourt.    

    

        Click here to Apply
